Post.title: centos7docker
Post._content:
### Linuxdocker3.10
```bash
$ uname -r
```

### docker
```bash
$ yum install docker
```

### docker
```bash
$ systemctl start docker
```

### docker
```bash
$ docker -v
```

### docker
```bash
$ systemctl stop docker
```

### docker
```bash
$ systemctl enable docker
```

Post.title: dockermysql
Post._content:
### 
<https://hub.docker.com/_/mysql>

### docker(:latest)
```bash
# 5.7
$ docker pull mysql:5.7
```

### mysql
```bash
$ docker run -id --name mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 mysql:5.7
```
-e  MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD root

### 
```bash
$ docker run -id --name mysql -p 3306:3306  -v /opt/mysql:/etc/mysql/conf.d  -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 mysql:5.7
```
-v /opt/mysql:/etc/mysql/conf.d/opt/mysql/etc/mysql/conf.d/opt/mysql

### 
mysql
```bash
$ docker run -id --name mysql -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 mysql:5.7 --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
```
--character-set-server=utf8mb4utf8mb4utf8utf8
--collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ciutf8mb4_unicode_ci


```bash
$ docker run -it --rm mysql:tag --verbose --help
```

### 
```
$ docker run -id --name mysql -p 3306:3306  -v /opt/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 mysql:5.7
```
-v /opt/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql/opt/mysql/data/var/lib/mysql mysql/opt/mysql/data

Post.title: dockerredis
Post._content:
### 1.
<https://hub.docker.com/_/redis>

### 2.docker(:latest)
```bash
 docker pull redis:5.0.14
 docker pull registry.docker-cn.com/library/redis:5.0.14   #docker
```


### 3.
```bash
 docker run -itd -p 6380:6379 name="redis" docker.io/redis
```
-it
-p:
--name

### 4.

#### redis.conf 
<https://redis.io/topics/config>

#### redis.conf
  bind 0.0.0.0        #ip
  protected-mode yes	#bind ipno
  port 6379			      #
  daemonize no		    #docker
  pidfile /var/run/redis_6379.pid	#
  requirepass zhaoxinjie #

  ##### SNAPSHOTTING   RDB
  save 900 1
  save 300 10
  save 60 10000

  dbfilename dump.rdb	#rdb
  dir ./				#
  rdbcompression yes	#

  ##### AOF
  appendonly yes	#AOF
  appendfilename "appendonly.aof"	#
  appendfsync everysec	# always everysec  no 
  auto-aof-rewrite-percentage 100	#100
  auto-aof-rewrite-min-size 3gb	#AOFrewrite3GB


#### 
```bash
docker run -idt --privileged=true -p 6379:6379 -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node1/redis.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node1/data:/data --name=redis-node1 redis:5.0.14 redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf
```
redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf    #
/hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node1/redis.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf    # 
/hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node1/data:/data    #  

#### 
```bash
docker ps -a | grep node1   #

docker exec -it redis-node1 redis-cli -h 127.0.0.1 -p 6379  #redis-cli   -h -p 

127.0.0.1:6379> AUTH password   #
```
![](/images/redis/redis1.png)
![](/images/redis/redis2.png)
Post.raw:

Post.title: dockerpostgres
Post._content:
### 
<https://hub.docker.com/_/postgres>

### docker(:latest)
```bash
$ docker pull postgres:11
```

### docker()
```bash
$ docker pull registry.docker-cn.com/library/postgres
```

### 
```bash
$ docker images
```

### 
```bash
$ docker run -itd -p 5432:5432 -name="postgres" -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=zhaoxinjie postgres:11
```
-it
-p:
--name
-e POSTGRES_PASSWORDpostgres

### 
#### /root/postgres/
```bash
$ docker run -i --rm postgres cat /usr/share/postgresql/postgresql.conf.sample > /root/postgres/postgres.conf 
```
#### 
```bash
$ docker run -itd --name postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=zhaoxinjie --privileged=true -v /root/postgres/data/:/var/lib/postgresql/data -v /root/postgres/postgres.conf:/etc/postgresql/postgresql.conf postgres:11 -c 'config_file=/etc/postgresql/postgresql.conf' 
```
--privileged=truerootroot
-v
/root/postgres/postgres.conf
/root/postgres/data/

Post.title: dockerspringboot
Post._content:
### springbootjar


### Dockerfile
```Dockerfile
FROM java:8
VOLUME /tmp
COPY myweb-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar /opt/web/app.jar
COPY /config/application.yml /opt/web/config/application.yml
WORKDIR /opt/web
RUN bash -c "touch /app.jar"
EXPOSE 8080
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "app.jar"]
```
FROMjava8
VOLUME/tmp /var/lib/docker /tmp/tmpDocker  Spring Boot  Tomcat /tmp
COPYspringbootjardocker
WORKDIR
RUNtouch /app.jar
EXPOSE8080
ENTRYPOINTjava -jar app.jar

### 
#### jarDockerfile/opt/webymlconfigDockerfile/opt/web/config

#### 
```bash
$ docker build -t myweb:v1 .
```
-ttagmywebv1

### 
```bash
$ docker run -itd --name=myweb -p 8080:8080 -v /opt/web/config/application.yml:/opt/web/config/application.yml -v /opt/web/logs/:/opt/web/logs --privileged=true myweb:v1
```

yumvim

Post.title: dockervsftpd
Post._content:
### 
<https://hub.docker.com/r/fauria/vsftpd>

### docker(:latest)
```bash
$ docker pull fauria/vsftpd
```


### 
```bash
$ docker images
```


### 
```bash
$ docker  run -idt -v /var/ftp:/home/vsftpd \ 
  -p 20:20 -p 21:21 -p  21100-21110:21100-21110 \ 
  -e FTP_USER=test -e FTP_PASS=test \ 
  -e PASV_ADDRESS=192.168.3.37 \ 
  -e PASV_MIN_PORT=21100 -e PASV_MAX_PORT=21110 \ 
  --name vsftpd --restart=always fauria/vsftpd
```
-v/home/vsftpd/var/ftpvar
-e FTP_USER=testtest
-e FTP_PASS=testtest
-e PASV_ADDRESS=192.168.3.37ftpip
-e PASV_MIN_PORTdocker
-e PASV_MAX_PORTdocker
--restart=alwaysdocker

### 
![](/images/ftp/ftp1.png)

Post.title: postgresql
Post._content:
### 
```sql
SELECT * FROM pg_stat_activity where query ~ 'table_name';
```
### 
```sql
SELECT pg_terminate_backend(pid) FROM pg_stat_activity where query ~ 'table_name' and pid <> pg_backend_pid();
```

Post.title: redis-
Post._content:
## 

### 1.
  1master
  2salve
  3mastersalve


### 2.redis.conf

#### master 
```
  bind 0.0.0.0        #ip
  protected-mode yes  #bind ipno
  port 6379			      #
  daemonize no        #docker
  pidfile /var/run/redis_6379.pid	#
  requirepass password #

  ##### SNAPSHOTTING  RDB
  save 900 1
  save 300 10
  save 60 10000

  dbfilename dump.rdb #rdb
  dir ./              #
  rdbcompression yes  #

  ##### AOF
  appendonly yes                                              #AOF
  appendfilename "appendonly.aof"                             #
  appendfsync everysec                                        # always everysec  no 
  auto-aof-rewrite-percentage 100                             #100
  auto-aof-rewrite-min-size 3gb                               #AOFrewrite3GB

  masterauth password                                         #masterslavemaster1mastermaster1

```

#### slave
  master
  port
  master

```
  ##### slave
  replicaof 10.0.16.4 6379   #
  replica-read-only yes      #
  masterauth password        #

```
### 3.redis
node1masternode2node3slave

##### node1
```
docker run -idt --privileged=true --net=host -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node1/redis.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node1/data:/data --name=redis-node1 redis:5.0.14 redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf --port 6379 
```
--net=host  #-p masterslave127.0.0.1 6379salve
--port 6379 #6379

##### node2
```
docker run -idt --privileged=true --net=host -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node2/redis.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node2/data:/data --name=redis-node2 redis:5.0.14 redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf --port 6380
```
--port 6380 #63806379master

##### node3
```
docker run -idt --privileged=true --net=host -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node3/redis.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /hzzxj/redis/redis-ms/node3/data:/data --name=redis-node3 redis:5.0.14 redis-server /usr/local/etc/redis/redis.conf --port 6381
```
--port 6381 #6381


### 4.redis
```
docker ps -a | grep redis- #
```
![](/images/redis/redis-master1.png)


master
```
docker exec -it redis-node1 redis-cli -p 6379  #redis-cliredis-p 

127.0.0.1:6379> auth password           #

127.0.0.1:6379> info                    #

127.0.0.1:6379> set redis test          #

127.0.0.1:6379> get redis               #
```
![](/images/redis/redis-master2.png)
![](/images/redis/redis-master3.png)


salve
![](/images/redis/redis-master4.png)

slavemaster


## 

### 1.

1redis
2masterslavemaster
3

### 2.
  263792638026381
```
bind 0.0.0.0
port 26379                                            # 263792638026381
daemonize no
pidfile /var/run/keydb-sentinel.pid
logfile ""
dir /tmp
protected-mode yes
sentinel monitor mymaster 10.0.16.4 6379 2            # mymaster 10.0.16.4 maseterip6379 master2 2
sentinel auth-pass mymaster password                  # sentinel monitor
sentinel down-after-milliseconds mymaster 5000
sentinel parallel-syncs mymaster 1
sentinel failover-timeout mymaster 180000
sentinel deny-scripts-reconfig yes
```

### 3.
 redis
```
# 126379
docker run -idt --name=sentinel-26379 --net=host -v /hzzxj/redis/sentinel/26379/sentinel-26379.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/sentinel.conf redis:5.0.14 redis-sentinel /usr/local/etc/redis/sentinel.conf

# 126379
docker run -idt --name=sentinel-26380 --net=host -v /hzzxj/redis/sentinel/26380/sentinel-26380.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/sentinel.conf redis:5.0.14 redis-sentinel /usr/local/etc/redis/sentinel.conf

# 126379
docker run -idt --name=sentinel-26381 --net=host -v /hzzxj/redis/sentinel/26381/sentinel-26381.conf:/usr/local/etc/redis/sentinel.conf redis:5.0.14 redis-sentinel /usr/local/etc/redis/sentinel.conf
```

### 4.
  
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel1.png)

  
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel2.png)

  
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel3.png)

  masterdocker stop redis-node1master6380
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel4.png)

  6380masterslave6381
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel5.png)
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel6.png)

  node1node1masterslave
![](/images/redis/redis-sentinel7.png)
